info.+content: in 2027, Motoko Kusanagi is a highly skilled agent of the military that meets Daisuke Aramaki, former soldier who is currently the chief of Public Security Section 9. Their encounter sparks the assembly of an elite new unit within Section 9.
"GHOST IN THE SHELL ARISE" by Cornelius
#1: "Jibun ga Inai" (じぶんがいない / There is no me) by Salyu x Salyu
#2: "Soto wa Senjō da yo" (外は戦場だよ / It's a Battlefield Out There) by Ichiko Aoba
#3: "Heart Grenade" by Sean Lennon and Cornelius
攻殻機動隊ARISE -GHOST IN THE SHELL-
